hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Mas'ud said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The sun and the moon do not become eclipsed for the death or birth of anyone, rather they are two of the signs of Allah (SWT), the Mighty and Sublime, so when you see that then pray

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِالصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ كُسُوفِ الْقَمَرِ
chapter.eng-name: The command to pray when there is a lunar eclipse
